column1: The Pit Room////For lack of a better term
column2: their food slaps. I don't think I've ever had as delightful brisket as the kind they serve up here
column3: and their pork ribs are fall-off-the-bone tender
column4: as all good ribs should be. On my visits here I've also had the chance to try the jalapeno cheddar sausage
column5: which is by far the best I've had in Texas. It's smoky and spicy without overpowering the cheddar nibs and pork flavor.
